summary: Added provider probe cache metrics visibility and fallback-reason regression coverage
details: Extended /api/providers responses with cache statistics (size/hits/misses/expired/hitRate) and surfaced them in ProviderHealth UI. Added SkillRL regression tests to ensure quota-aware routing learning is triggered only for quota-related fallback reasons and not non-quota fallback paths.
impact: Medium - Improves probe observability and prevents over-learning from non-quota fallback events
